    Elliptical Copula → TrialSimulator：端到端示例（Gaussian）

    Elliptical.Rmd

    本 vignette 展示如何把 simdatacopulas（椭圆族 copula）生成的“可控相关 + 任意边缘”的联合生成器，封装成 TrialSimulator 需要的 generator(n)，并完成：

    1. 定义 endpoints / arms / trial
    2. 设置里程碑（milestones）并运行
    3. 读取锁库数据（locked data）并做基础校验

    1. 加载依赖 

    library(simdata)
library(simdatacopulas)
library(TrialSimulator)

    2. 用 Gaussian copula 构造联合生成器（椭圆族）

    核心思想：

    1. copula 负责生成相关的 U∈(0,1)dU \in (0,1)^d
    2. 边缘分位数函数 dist[[j]](u) 把每列 UjU_j 映射到目标变量尺度

    本示例构造 4 维相关结构（structure = "un"）：

    • PFS_raw：PFS 的原始生存时间（正数）
    • OS_extra：PFS 之后额外存活时间（正数）
    • BIOM_latent：连续 biomarker
    • ORR_latent：latent 正态，后续阈值化为二分类 ORR

    2.1 相关矩阵（unstructured） 

    Sigma <- matrix(c(
  1.0,  0.6,  0.4,  0.3,
  0.6,  1.0,  0.5,  0.4,
  0.4,  0.5,  1.0,  0.7,
  0.3,  0.4,  0.7,  1.0
), nrow = 4, byrow = TRUE)
Sigma
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]  1.0  0.6  0.4  0.3
#> [2,]  0.6  1.0  0.5  0.4
#> [3,]  0.4  0.5  1.0  0.7
#> [4,]  0.3  0.4  0.7  1.0

    2.2 placebo 与 treatment 的边缘分布

    两组使用相同的 copula 相关结构 Sigma，但边缘分布参数不同，用于表达“治疗效果”：

    • treatment 的 PFS/OS 更长
    • treatment 的 ORR 更高
    • treatment 的 BIOM 均值更低（仅作示例）
    dist_pbo <- list(
  function(u) stats::qlnorm(u, meanlog = log(8),  sdlog = 0.5),
  function(u) stats::qlnorm(u, meanlog = log(6),  sdlog = 0.5),
  function(u) stats::qnorm(u,  mean = 0,         sd = 1.0),
  function(u) stats::qnorm(u,  mean = 0,         sd = 1.0)
)

dist_trt <- list(
  function(u) stats::qlnorm(u, meanlog = log(10), sdlog = 0.5),
  function(u) stats::qlnorm(u, meanlog = log(8),  sdlog = 0.5),
  function(u) stats::qnorm(u,  mean = -0.3,       sd = 1.0),
  function(u) stats::qnorm(u,  mean = 0.5,        sd = 1.0)
)

    2.3 构造 simdesign 

    design_pbo <- simdesign_gaussian_copula(
  dist        = dist_pbo,
  Sigma       = Sigma,
  structure   = "un",
  names_final = c("PFS_raw", "OS_extra", "BIOM_latent", "ORR_latent")
)

design_trt <- simdesign_gaussian_copula(
  dist        = dist_trt,
  Sigma       = Sigma,
  structure   = "un",
  names_final = c("PFS_raw", "OS_extra", "BIOM_latent", "ORR_latent")
)

    3. 将 simdesign 封装成 TrialSimulator 的 generator(n)

    TrialSimulator 对 endpoint generator 的“硬性协议”要点：

    • 第一个参数名必须是 n
    • 返回值必须是长度 n 的向量，或 n 行的 data.frame
    • 对 TTE 类型 endpoint：必须包含 <name>_event 列
    • 对 non-tte 类型 endpoint：列名必须与 endpoint(name=...) 中一致；并需要 readout

    本例的关键封装逻辑：

    • 先用 simdata::simulate_data(design, n_obs = n) 生成一批相关变量
    • 构造：
      • PFS = PFS_raw
      • OS = PFS_raw + OS_extra，从而保证 OS >= PFS
      • *_event 初始都置为 1（TrialSimulator 会在锁库时点根据 dropout/duration 再做删失截尾）
      • ORR 由 ORR_latent > cutoff 得到 0/1
      • BIOM 直接使用 BIOM_latent 
    make_elliptical_endpoint_rng <- function(design, orr_cutoff) {
  function(n) {
    latent <- simdata::simulate_data(design, n_obs = n)

    pfs_raw  <- latent[["PFS_raw"]]
    os_extra <- latent[["OS_extra"]]

    PFS <- pfs_raw
    OS  <- pfs_raw + os_extra

    data.frame(
      PFS       = PFS,
      PFS_event = rep(1L, n),
      OS        = OS,
      OS_event  = rep(1L, n),
      ORR       = as.integer(latent[["ORR_latent"]] > orr_cutoff),
      BIOM      = latent[["BIOM_latent"]]
    )
  }
}

rng_pbo <- make_elliptical_endpoint_rng(
  design = design_pbo,
  orr_cutoff = stats::qnorm(0.6)
)

rng_trt <- make_elliptical_endpoint_rng(
  design = design_trt,
  orr_cutoff = stats::qnorm(0.4)
)

head(rng_pbo(n = 3))
#>         PFS PFS_event        OS OS_event ORR       BIOM
#> 1  7.391745         1 11.801768        1   0 -0.2629372
#> 2 15.320582         1 39.149817        1   1  0.9226623
#> 3  6.748693         1  9.489182        1   0  0.2843882
head(rng_trt(n = 3))
#>         PFS PFS_event       OS OS_event ORR       BIOM
#> 1  9.396886         1 17.60086        1   1 -0.1056969
#> 2  5.041018         1 24.14024        1   1 -0.3307242
#> 3 16.190373         1 23.84778        1   1  0.6360824

    4. 定义 endpoints 与 arms

    我们定义 4 个终点：

    • PFS, OS：TTE
    • ORR, BIOM：non-tte

    并指定 non-tte 的读出时间（readout）：

    • ORR：第 6 月读出
    • BIOM：基线可得（0）
    ep_pbo <- endpoint(
  name      = c("PFS", "OS", "ORR", "BIOM"),
  type      = c("tte", "tte", "non-tte", "non-tte"),
  readout   = c(ORR = 6, BIOM = 0),
  generator = rng_pbo
)

ep_trt <- endpoint(
  name      = c("PFS", "OS", "ORR", "BIOM"),
  type      = c("tte", "tte", "non-tte", "non-tte"),
  readout   = c(ORR = 6, BIOM = 0),
  generator = rng_trt
)

arm_pbo <- arm(name = "placebo")
arm_pbo$add_endpoints(ep_pbo)

arm_trt <- arm(name = "treatment")
arm_trt$add_endpoints(ep_trt)

    5. 定义试验并运行

    这里用两条简单的 wrapper 函数定义入组与脱落时间（指数分布）：

    • enroller_fn(n)：生成每位患者的入组等待时间（TrialSimulator 会把它累积成日历入组时间）
    • dropout_fn(n)：生成每位患者从入组开始算起的脱落时长
    set.seed(202502)

enroller_fn <- function(n) stats::rexp(n, rate = log(2) / 4)
dropout_fn  <- function(n) stats::rexp(n, rate = log(2) / 40)

trial_obj <- trial(
  name       = "elliptical-copula-demo",
  n_patients = 400,
  duration   = 36,
  enroller   = enroller_fn,
  dropout    = dropout_fn,
  seed       = 202502,
  silent     = TRUE
)

trial_obj$add_arms(sample_ratio = c(1, 1), arm_pbo, arm_trt)

milestone_interim <- milestone(
  name   = "interim",
  when   = eventNumber(endpoint = "PFS", n = 100),
  action = doNothing
)

milestone_final <- milestone(
  name   = "final",
  when   = calendarTime(time = 36),
  action = doNothing
)

listener_obj <- listener()
listener_obj$add_milestones(milestone_interim, milestone_final)

controller_obj <- controller(trial_obj, listener_obj)
controller_obj$run(plot_event = FALSE)

    6. 读取锁库数据并做基础校验 

    locked_interim <- trial_obj$get_locked_data("interim")
locked_final   <- trial_obj$get_locked_data("final")

head(locked_interim)
#>   patient_id       arm enroll_time dropout_time       PFS PFS_event        OS
#> 1          1   placebo  0.01221316    13.301585  3.478958         1  7.113029
#> 2          2 treatment  0.02450945    15.774237 10.834391         0 10.834391
#> 3          3   placebo  0.02573936    56.214587  6.171054         1 10.833161
#> 4          4 treatment  0.03014191     6.364573  5.338581         1  6.364573
#> 5          5 treatment  0.03410321   212.037393  7.963732         1 10.824797
#> 6          6   placebo  0.03857396    86.722214 10.820327         0 10.820327

#> 1        1   0 -2.1521682           6            0
#> 2        0   1 -1.6342618           6            0
#> 3        0   0 -0.3427376           6            0
#> 4        0   0 -1.1959608           6            0
#> 5        0   0 -1.0363959           6            0
#> 6        0   1 -0.8447639           6            0
head(locked_final)
#>   patient_id       arm enroll_time dropout_time       PFS PFS_event        OS

#> 2          2 treatment  0.02450945    15.774237 10.941267         1 15.774237
#> 3          3   placebo  0.02573936    56.214587  6.171054         1 10.982341

#> 5        1   0 -1.0363959           6            0
#> 6        1   1 -0.8447639           6            0

    6.1 关键一致性检查

    1. OS >= PFS（由生成规则保证；TrialSimulator 做删失/截尾后仍应保持）
    2. cor(PFS, OS)（应明显大于 0）
    3. placebo vs treatment 的 ORR/BIOM 差异（应体现你设定的边缘差异）
    all(locked_final$OS >= locked_final$PFS, na.rm = TRUE)
#> [1] TRUE

with(locked_final, stats::cor(PFS, OS, use = "complete.obs"))
#> [1] 0.8757661

with(subset(locked_final, arm == "placebo"), mean(ORR, na.rm = TRUE))
#> [1] 0.4324324
with(subset(locked_final, arm == "treatment"), mean(ORR, na.rm = TRUE))
#> [1] 0.7853107

with(subset(locked_final, arm == "placebo"), mean(BIOM, na.rm = TRUE))
#> [1] -0.03195274
with(subset(locked_final, arm == "treatment"), mean(BIOM, na.rm = TRUE))
#> [1] -0.29802

    6.2 删失与缺失比例（解释 TrialSimulator 输出非常有用）

    • 对 TTE：*_event = 0 通常表示在锁库时点仍未观察到事件（随访截止/脱落导致删失）
    • 对 non-tte：如果锁库时点尚未到达 readout，或患者已脱落，则该变量可能为 NA 
    with(locked_final, tapply(PFS_event, arm, mean, na.rm = TRUE))
#>   placebo treatment 
#> 0.8743719 0.8090452
with(locked_final, tapply(OS_event,  arm, mean, na.rm = TRUE))
#>   placebo treatment 
#> 0.7487437 0.6381910

with(locked_final, tapply(is.na(ORR), arm, mean))
#>    placebo  treatment 
#> 0.07035176 0.11055276
with(locked_final, tapply(is.na(BIOM), arm, mean))
#>   placebo treatment 
#>         0         0
